name: Sproxxy
description: Sproxxy (Speaker + Proxy) is an enterprise Saas solution used to book and manage corporate spokespeople at industry events and find out the ROI and business impact of your efforts. With Sproxxy, you cut waste sponsoring, attending and speaking at events.
one_liner: Sproxxy (Speaker + Proxy) is an enterprise Saas solution used to book and manage corporate spokespeople at industry events and find out the ROI and business impact of your efforts. With Sproxxy, you cut waste sponsoring, attending and speaking at events.
location: New York City, New York, United States
